synopsis.text:
Lightchaser Studio's latest feature, White Snake, transports viewers to the chaotic era of the late Tang dynasty, where a young snake catcher, Xuan, stumbles upon a mysterious woman, Blanca, near a waterfall. With no recollection of her past, Blanca and Xuan embark on a perilous journey to unravel her true identity, forging a deep romantic connection along the way. As they delve deeper into her enigmatic past, they uncover a sinister plot involving supernatural forces vying for power, threatening the very existence of the world.

White Snake serves as a prequel to an ancient and enduring Chinese legend, seamlessly blending passionate romance, epic action, and stunning animation. As the pair navigates the treacherous landscape filled with mythical beasts, assassins, and wuxia action, they must confront their past and find their place in the world amidst the looming disaster. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, Xuan and Blanca's love story unfolds, promising an adventure that is as captivating as it is entertaining.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
